title: free savoury pastry
description: Gluten-free flours are a little harder to work with, but worth mastering. Keep the dough dry; although slightly more difficult to handle, it gives a crisper, 'shorter' crust for quiches and pies.
ingredients: 75g/3oz potato flour, plus extra for dusting
1 egg, preferably free-range, mixed with two tbsp cold water
